thread.title: Facebook: Apple's iOS Can't Handle Our Scale
thread.title_full: Facebook: Apple's iOS Can't Handle Our Scale - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: Facebook: Apple's iOS Can't Handle Our Scale
text: My guess is that you haven't heard anyone saying that Apple's iOS frameworks or its Xcode integrated development environment aren't considered a viable solution for some company's infrastructure. Fact is that even though the development tools and frameworks Apple provides iOS developers with are usually enough for any development team to be able to deliver a working iOS app without the need of specially designed tools to finish the job. However, Simon Whitaker, a London-... Â»
